class.name: DotnetCleanStep
class.description: A [dotnet clean step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command

function.name: dotnetClean
function.description: Adds a [dotnet clean step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run .NET CLI command @see DotnetCleanStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths to projects and solutions. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Build working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for script, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: outputDir
param.description: The directory where outputs are placed.

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for dotnet clean.

param.name: required.sdk
param.description: .NET SDK versions separated by semicolon to be required on agents.

example.description: Runs [`dotnet clean`](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet-clean) command for all the solution files in the checkout directory with the detailed logging.
